pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, March 28, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Wednesday, March 28, 2018:

Ottawa, Ontario

9 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Fédération des communautés francophones et acadiennes du Canada, the Quebec Community Groups Network, as well as young leaders from official language minority communities.

Prime Minister’s Office
Centre Block, Parliament Hill

Closed to media

10 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the National Caucus meeting.

12:30 p.m. The Prime Minister and the Minister of Canadian Heritage, Mélanie Joly, will unveil the Action Plan for Official Languages 2018–2023: Investing in Our Future. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks.

École élémentaire publique Mauril-Bélanger
307 Montgomery Street

Notes to media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 12 p.m.

2 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.
